   [======= JNys_3,2.V: sthāna(to 'pya)bhedādhikaraṇam =======]	[====== JNyH _3,2.V: sTAna (taH api a)Beda aDikaraNam =======]

   // oṃ phalamata upapatteḥ oṃ //	// om Palam atas upapatteH om //
   atrādau tāvatsvarganarakādikaṃ phalaṃ prāṇināmīśvarādeva bhavatīti	atra AdO tAvat svarga naraka Adikam Palam prANinAm ISvarAt eva Bavati iti
   śrutyupapattibhyāmupapāditam /	Sruti upapattiByAm upapAditam /
   tadākṣepārthaṃ sūtraṃ"dharmaṃ jaiminirata eva'; iti /	tad Akzepa arTam sUtraM"Darmam jEmini H ataH eva a; iti /
   tasyārthaḥ /	tasya arTaH /
   īśvaraḥ phalakāraṇaṃ ceddharmādharmāvapekṣate na vā /	ISvaraH Pala kAraNam ced Darma aDarmO= apekzate na vA /
   neti pakṣe vaiṣamyādyāpattirvedāprāmāṇyaprasaktiśca /	na iti pakze vEzamya Adi ApattiH veda aprAmANya prasaktiH ca /
   ādye kimīśvareṇa tadapekṣaṇīyenaiva karmaṇā phalasiddheḥ /	Adye kim ISvareNa tad apekzaNIyena eva karmaNA Pala sidDeH /
   anyathā gauravāpatteḥ /	anyaTA gOrava ApatteH /
   na cācetanatvopapattivirodhaḥ /	na ca acetana tva upapatti viroDaH /
   nahi rājādiriva karma phalaṃ dadātīti brūmo yenācetanatvaṃ bādheta /	na hi rAja AdiH iva karma Palam dadAti iti brUmaH yena acetana tvam bADeta /
   kintu kāraṇamātram /	kintu kAraNa mAtram /
   naca śrutivirodhaḥ /	na ca Sruti viroDaH /
   phalakāraṇayordharmādharmayorīśvarakāritatvena tatstutaye tasya	Pala kAraNayoH Darma aDarmayoH ISvara kArita tvena tad stutaye tasya
   phalakāraṇatvopacārāditi /	Pala kAraNa tva upacArAt iti /
   samādhānārthaṃ sūtram /	samADAna arTam sUtram /
   oṃ pūrvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo hetuvyapadeśāt oṃ //	om pUrvam tu bAdarAyaNaH hetu vyapadeSAt om //
   tenedamuktam /	tena idam uktam /
   apekṣata eveśvaro dharmādharmau /	apekzate eva ISvaraH Darma aDarmO /
   naca tāvatā tayorevāstu phalahetuteti yuktam /	na ca tAvatA tayoH eva astu Pala hetu ta iti yuktam /
   dharmāderiveśvarasyāpi phalahetutayā śrutisiddhatvena tyāgāyogāt /	Darma AdeH iva ISvarasya api Pala hetu tayA Sruti sidDa tvena tyAga ayogAt /
   bādhakābhāvena śruterupacaritārthatākalpanānupapatteḥ /	bADaka aBAvena SruteH upacarita arTa tA kalpana anupapatteH /
   gauravasyāprāmāṇikaviṣayatvāt /	gOravasya aprAmANika vizaya tvAt /
   parasya brahmaṇaḥ karmaṇaścobhayorhetutve sāmyāpattirityapi na vācyam /	parasya brahmaNaH karmaNaH ca uBayoH hetu tve sAmya ApattiH iti api na vAcyam /
   yataḥ phaladāne parameśvaraḥ kartṛtvena karma tu kāraṇatvena puṇyena	yatas Pala dAne parameSvaraH kartR tvena karma tu kAraNa tvena puNyena
   puṇyamityādau vyapadiśyate /	puNyam iti AdO vyapadiSyate /
   karaṇaṃ ca kartṛprayojyamiti prasiddhameveti /	karaNam ca kartR prayojyam iti prasidDam eva iti /
   tatredamāśaṅkayate /	tatra idam ASaFkayate /
   tathāpi karmāpekṣasyeśvarasya phaladāne 'nupacaritaṃ svātantryaṃ na	taTA api karma apekzasya ISvarasya Pala dAne anupacaritam svAtantryam na
   siddhayati /	sidDayati /
   tataśca na tasminbahumānātiśaya iti /	tatas ca na tasmin bahu mAna atiSayaH iti /
   etatparihāratvena pūrvapadaṃ vyākhyāti  sa eveti //	etat parihAra tvena pUrva padam vyAKyAti saH eva iti //
   pūrvaṃ tu bādarāyaṇo hetuvyapadeśāt | BBs_3,2.41 |	pUrvam tu bAdarAyaNaH hetu vyapadeSAt | BBH _3,2.41 |
   phalamata upapatteḥ | BBs_3,2.38 |	Palam atas upapatteH | BBH _3,2.38 |
   sa evāśeṣajīvasthanissaṅkhayānādikālikān /	saH eva aSeza jIva sTa nissaFKa yAna Adi kAlikAn /
   dharmādharmān sadā paśyan svecchayā bodhayatyajaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.202 //	Darma aDarmAn sadA paSyan sva icCayA boDayati ajaH // Ma anuv_3,2.202 //
   kāṃścit teṣāṃ phalaṃ caiva dadāti svayamacyutaḥ /	kAMScid tezAm Palam ca eva dadAti svayam acyutaH /
   na te viśeṣaṃ kamapi preraṇādikamucyate /	na te viSezam kam api preraNa Adikam ucyate /
   kuryuḥ kadāpi tenāyaṃ svatantro 'nupacārataḥ // MAnuv_3,2.203 //	kuryuH kadApi tena ayam svatantraH anupacArataH // Ma anuv_3,2.203 //
   NYĀYASUDHĀ:	NYĀYA SUDHĀ:
   anādikālatvaṃ ca pravāhāpekṣayoktam kāṃścit bodhayati savyāpārīkaroti	anAdi kAla tvam ca pravAha apekzayA uktam kAMScid boDayati sa vyApArIkaroti
   svayameveti sambandhaḥ /	svayam eva iti sambanDaH /
   līlayā karaṇīkaroti na tu tena vinā dātuṃ na śaknotīti bhāvaḥ /	lIlayA karaNIkaroti na tu tena vinA dAtum na Saknoti iti BAvaH /
   yadetadatroktaṃ dharmādharmadarśanaṃ tatpreraṇaṃ tatphaladānaṃ	yat etat atra uktam Darma aDarma darSanam tat preraNam tad Pala dAnam
   tadapreryatvādikaṃ ceśvarasya /	tad aprerya tva Adikam ca ISvarasya /
   tadeva vicāryamāṇaṃ tasminmahāntaṃ bahumānamutpādayiṣyati kimu	tat eva vicAryamANam tasmin mahAntam bahu mAnam utpAdayizyati kim u
   samastapadārtha ityāśayavānkamarṇāṃ svarūpaṃ tāvatprapañcayati  karmāṇīti	samasta padArTaH iti ASayavAn kamarNAm svarUpam tAvat prapaQcayati karmANi iti
   karmāṇi tāni ca pṛthak cetanānyeva sarvaśaḥ /	karmANi tAni ca pRTak cetanAni eva sarvaSas /
   acetanaśarīrāṇi svakarmaphalabhāñci ca // MAnuv_3,2.204 //	acetana SarIrANi sva karma Pala BAQci ca // Ma anuv_3,2.204 //
   pratyekaṃ teṣu cānantakarmāṇyevaṃvidhāni ca /	pratyekam tezu ca ananta karmANi evaMviDAni ca /
   tāni caivam ... // MAnuv_3,2.205a c //	tAni ca evam ... // Ma anuv_3,2.205a t //
   NYĀYASUDHĀ:	NYĀYA SUDHĀ:
   tānītyaśeṣajīvasthetyādyuktaviśeṣaṇāni /	tAni iti aSeza jIva sTA ityAdi ukta viSezaNAni /
   pṛthagityekaikadharmādharmādhiṣṭhā(tṛ)nabhūtāni muktavyāvṛttaye	pRTak iti eka eka Darma aDarma aDizWA( tR)naBUtAni mukta vyAvRttaye
   'cetanaśarīrāṇītyuktam /	acetana SarIrANi iti uktam /
   tata eva svakarmaphalabhāñji ca /	tatas eva sva karma Pala BAQji ca /
   teṣu karmābhimāniṣu /	tezu karma aBimAnizu /
   evaṃvidhānīti cetanatvādyuktadharmavanti tāni teṣvapi karmasu vartamānāni	evaMviDAni iti cetana tvAdi ukta Darmavanti tAni tezu api karmasu vartamAnAni

   NYĀYASUDHĀ:	NYĀYA SUDHĀ:
   evaṃbhūtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ darśanādimataḥ /	evaMBUtAnAm karmaNAm darSana AdimataH /
   uttamā pratibandhādirahitatvāt /	uttamA pratibanDa Adi rahita tvAt /
   karmaṇāmevaṃvidhatvaṃ kuta ityata āha  ekaiveti //	karmaNAm evaMviDa tvam kutas iti atas Aha ekA eva iti //
   ekaiva brahmahatyā hi varāhahariṇoditā // MAnuv_3,2.206ab //	ekA eva brahmahatyA hi varAha hariNA uditAH // Ma anuv_3,2.206aB //
   NYĀYASUDHĀ:	NYĀYA SUDHĀ:
   hariṇaiva na tvarvācīnena /	hariNA eva na tvaru AcInena /

   anantānyuditānyevaṃ prabhuṇā kapilena hi /	anantAni uditAni evam praBuNA kapilena hi /
   saṃsāre pacyamānāni karmāṇyapi pṛthak pṛthak // MAnuv_3,2.208 //	saMsAre pacyamAnAni karmANi api pRTak pRTak // Ma anuv_3,2.208 //
   NYĀYASUDHĀ:	NYĀYA SUDHĀ:
   anena samagramitihāsaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa smārayanti /	anena samagram itihAsam saMkzepeNa smArayanti /

   // iti śrīmatpūrṇapramatibhagavatpādasukṛteranuvyākhyānasya	// iti SrImat pUrNa pramati Bagavat pAda sukRteH anuvyAKyAnasya
